column4: How can I move out from a game? Like, Warzow it has too big resolution set or something, and my screen just says "Input out of range", how can I get out of Warzow and back to the desktop?
Try going to a text console with ctrl-alt-f1, log in, kill the process, go back to the desktop.
'killall warsow' will work if warsow is the name of the process.
